t: Target's Goodfellow private label moves into men's grooming | Retail Dive
s: May 20, 2019 - Target on Friday announced that its men's Goodfellow brand would be expanding to include grooming products after a year of testing. The grooming line launched in stores and online May 19, according to a company press release.
